Classes

Angle
AppConfig

Provides ways to enable and disable certain functionality of the simulation.

Application

Hosts all of the components in a simulation.

ApplicationPlatformAttribute

Specifies a platform implementation in an assembly.

CollectionsHelper

Provides utilities for copying data between different kinds of collections.

Collision

Contains various methods for determining collisions between shapes.

Gamepad

Provides gamepad input to the application.

InputContext

Controls the input sent to a simulation.

Keyboard

Provides keyboard input to the simulation.

MathHelper

Contains various useful math-related methods.

Mouse

Provides mouse input to the application.

Performance

Provides performance-related information.

RealtimeProvider

Feeds real time values into a simulation.

Simulation

The base class for all simulations. Inherit this class or use Create(Action<AppConfig>, Action<ICanvas>) to create a simulation.

Time

Provides time values to the simulation.

VectorExtensions

Provides small utility extensions onto the System.Numerics Vector types.

Structs

Circle

A floating point 2-dimensional circle.

Color

Represents a 32-bit RGBA color.

ColorF

A RGBA floating point color.

Rectangle

An axis-aligned floating-point rectangle consisting of a position and size.

Interfaces

IApplicationComponent

The base interface for all application components.

IApplicationController

Handles the simulation's event loop.

IApplicationPlatform

Provides an environment for a simulation to run in.

ITimeProvider

Provider time measurements to an environment.

Enums

Alignment

Specifies how a shape should be aligned to it's position.

GamepadButton

Specifies the buttons on a gamepad.

Key
MouseButton

Represents buttons on a mouse.

Delegates

KeyEvent

A delegate for key up/down events.
